plot: Esteban is visited by his daughter Irene, shortly after his wife died by drowning in the house swimming pool. The coexistence between father and daughter will catalyze the grieving process the man is experiencing.
title: Al fondo
plot_es: Esteban is visited by his daughter Irene, shortly after his wife died by drowning in the house swimming pool. The coexistence between father and daughter will catalyze the grieving process the man is experiencing.
